author: cms-sw
body:
Some config file in geant4 distribution contains the build path which causes geant4-parfulcms to fail [a].
This PR fixes 
- the relocation of geant4 files 
- ccache-toolfile cleanup and fix for version
- set geant4-data version

[a]
```
make[2]: *** No rule to make target `/build/cmsbld/auto-builds/CMSSW_9_3_0_pre2-slc6_amd64_gcc630/build/CMSSW_9_3_0_pre2-build/slc6_amd64_gcc630/external/xerces-c/3.1.3/lib/libxerces-c.so', needed by `ParFullCMS'.  Stop.
make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/muzaffar/w2/BUILD/slc6_amd64_gcc630/external/geant4-parfullcms/2014.01.27-cms/ParFullCMS/build-ParFullCMS'
```
title: Fix geant4 relocation and cleanup of ccache toolfile
